title: Did i deserve to get banned here? I did not personally attack any1, just game play. No cussing eithe

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=BrandonH7,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=kyewrtkQ,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-12-08T04:43:51.205+0000)
>
>  i did not personally attack anyone. 

Yeah ya did.

In fact, most of your use of chat in those chat logs was attacking people.

How does... calling a person trash and a child _not_ equate to personal attack?

OP you really need to seriously reevaluate your manners.

I wonder, in OP's mind, what constitutes a 'personal attack'?
{{sticker:sg-janna}}
not personally just gameplay. and call  some1 a child.
My scroll wheel broke trying to get through these logs. Are you even playing the game? Damn.
if you typed less of those negative comments you would have a significantly less chance of getting punished.
Yeah you pointlessly started insulting a player. Like... why? Why would you decide its a good idea to start calling an enemy player pure garbage and trash? Fucking duh dude.
hadh im couple gsames ago on my teram thats why

> [{quoted}](name=BrandonH7,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=kyewrtkQ,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-12-08T04:56:39.661+0000)
>
> hadh im couple gsames ago on my teram thats why

Thats not why lol. I mean, what was the POINT of saying it? The goal. The reason. The expectation after saying it. WHY did you decide its a good idea to say it?
tbh if he realized he wasn't as good he can get better
Why don't you focus on getting better instead of trying to lecture people at your own elo?

At Rito HQ:

-"This guy is kinda toxic. What should we do?"
-"Maybe we should give him a warning and see if he improves his behavior."
-"Do you think that'll help?"
-"

> [{quoted}](name=BrandonH7,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=kyewrtkQ,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2018-12-08T14:17:15.014+0000)
>
> tbh if he realized he wasn't as good he can get better

"
-"I hope he does get better, or he's gonna keep ruining matches."
-"Well, if he doesn't, we'll just have to ban him."

_a short time later_

-"Look at the logs we just got."
-"Holy moly..."
-"Ban-a-roonie?"
-"Yep."

> Tbh i did not even cuss no one out and i did not personally attack anyone.
